page.title: 03LIST OF TRADERS (cont)
page.content:
17.Callows - Newsagent & General Stores 18.Ixworth Computer Centre & Robert Peal Guest House. 19.Antiques - E.W.Cousins & Son. 20.A.E.Thurlow & Son - Funeral Director and Builder. 21.The Crown Public House(Thetford Rd)
*************************************** 8 of the businesses or 40% have been established and under the present ownership for more than 10 years and 3 of these have been in business for more than 45 years.Four of the owners have been in business for 2 years or less. ***************************************
The businesses and shops in Ixworth employ 65 full-time and 26 part-time employees in addition to members of the owner's families.
